265681.「さっそくだが 大魔王……\n 魔界の現状について 報告申し上げる。:
Great Demon King, I would like to give you a
report on the current situation in the Demon
World.

265682.「状況は かなり悪い。\n バルディスタの領内では 魔瘴の濃度が\n 急激に上が:
The situation is quite dire. Near Valdista, the concentration of demon miasma has increased dramatically, and the land has
become contaminated.

265683.「ゼクレスも同じだ。\n 城下では 魔瘴が原因とみられる病に\n 苦しんでいる者:
Zechres is no better off. Some people in the
castle are suffering from an illness believed
to be caused by the demon miasma.

265684.「魔幻都市ゴーラでは さらに深刻らしい。 \n 濃密な魔瘴が 地の底からあふれ\:
In Gora, the situation seems to be even more serious. Dense demon miasma is said to be overflowing from the depths of the earth,
forcing the people to evacuate.

265685.「一方 ファラザード領内に 大きな変化はない。 \n この辺りも 今のところ 無:
Meanwhile, there have been no major changes in Farazard's territory. The area seems to be safe for now, but the Age of Miasma seems to
be approaching at last.

265686.「魔界が 魔瘴に沈めば\n その次は アストルティアだ。:
If the Demon World sinks into demon miasma,
Astoltia will be next.

265687.「だけど 滅びの神を倒すために\n 復活した 女神ルティアナは……。:
But the Goddess Lutiana, who was resurrected
to defeat the God of Destruction...

265688.「ジャゴヌバに敗れ 光の河へ 落ちていった。 \n もはや 滅びを食い止める手段:
...was defeated by Jagonuba, and fell into the
River of Light. There's no longer any way to
stop the coming destruction.

265690.「まだ ジャゴヌバに勝つ方法が……\n 俺たちにできることが きっと あるはずだ:
There must still be a way to beat Jagonuba...
something we can do. Don't you agree,
<pc>!?

265692.<center>私は 風の神エルドナ。\nかつて あなたに授けたチカラ……\n叡:
I am Eldona, God of the Wind. I speak to you
through the light of wisdom, the power I once
bestowed upon you.

265693.<center>闇が 世界を覆いつくそうとしています。\nなんとしても 滅びを:
Darkness is about to overtake the world. We
must do everything in our power to stop it.

265694.<center>お聞きなさい……我らが母 女神ルティアナは\n滅びの神の手で 肉:
Listen to me... our mother, the Goddess Lutiana, whose body was destroyed at the hands of the God of Destruction, but whose soul
sleeps at the bottom of the River of Light.

265695.<center>今こそ 世界樹の守り人 ヒメアが守る\n世界樹の花のチカラを 使:
Now is the time to use the power of the
Yggdrasil Flower that Himea now protects.

265696.<center>彼女のもとへ 向かいなさい。\nすべては アストルティアの 未来: Go to her. For the future of Astoltia.

265697.「気がついたようだな。お前 大丈夫か？\n なんだか 様子がおかしかったが……。:
You've finally come to. Are you alright? You
were acting a bit strange...

265698.「エルドナ神……女神ルティアナが生んだ \n 種族神の一柱からの 神託だって？:
Eldona... a message from one of the gods born
from Lutiana?

265699.「世界樹の守り人ヒメアと 世界樹の花か。\n それで 何が起こるか わからないが:
Himea, and the Yggdrasil Flower... I don't
know what this is about, but it looks like all
hope is not lost!

265700.「だが 追い詰められた状況に 変わりはない。\n 奇跡にすがり ただ待つようなマ:
But the situation hasn't changed. I don't like
waiting around for a miracle to happen.

265701.「私は バルディスタに戻り 魔瘴対策を続け\n 大魔瘴期の被害を 最小限におさえ:
I will return to Valdista to continue my countermeasures against the demon miasma and minimize the damage. Do as you will, Great
Demon King.

265702.「幸い ファラザードの被害は まだ少ない。\n ここは ユシュカが 大魔王と共に:
Fortunately, Farazard's damage is still
minimal. Yushka should head for Astoltia with
the Great Demon King.

265703.「できるなら 僕も 一緒に行きたかったけれど\n ゼクレスの民を 放ってはおけな:
I would go with you if I could, but I can't
leave the people of Zechres behind. I'll be
waiting for your good news, both of you.

265704.「ああ。こっちは まかせておけ。\n 必ず 皆で 大魔瘴期を乗り越えよう。:
Yeah. We'll leave things here to you. We'll
overcome the Age of Miasma together.

265705.「では……これにて 謁見終了！\n 大魔王城の留守は あずかりましたぞ。\n 安:
Well then... this audience is at an end! The Great Demon King's castle will be safe in my hands! You may depart without worry, Great
Demon King!

265706.「一刻も早く ヒメアのもとへ 向かおうぜ。\n わざわざ ルクスガルン大空洞を\:
Let's get to Himea as soon as possible. We
don't have time to go all the way through
the Luxgarn Caverns.

265707.「俺も お前のアビスジュエルに 便乗する。\n 準備ができたら アストルティアへ:
I'll ride along with your Abyss Jewel. When
you're ready, let's head to Astoltia.

265708.「前にも 通り過ぎたことはあったが……\n 相変わらず のんきなところだ。\n:
I've passed by this place before, but... it's
still as carefree as ever. I guess they don't
know anything about the danger of extinction.

265709.「<pc> そんちょう お帰りプッケ！\n この ちくちくヒゲのお兄さんは\n:
Chief <pc>, welcome back, oink!
Who's your friend with the stubble, oink?

265710.「ようこそ エテーネ村へ！\n ここは 新しい希望が生まれる村プッケ！:
Welcome to the village of Ethene! This is the
village where new hope is born, oink!

265711.「エテーネ村……。たしか ここは\n <pc>の故郷なんだよな。:
Ethene Village... I believe this is
<pc>'s hometown.

265712.「悪いが ゆっくりはしていられない。\n 魔界が 魔瘴に覆いつくされる前に\n:
Sorry, but we got no time to relax. We need to
go see Himea before the Demon World is
consumed by demon miasma.

265713.「すみませんが おふたりとも\n 出発は 明日まで お待ちください。:
I'm sorry, but I'm afraid I'll have to ask you
to wait until tomorrow before leaving.

265714.「お前は……シンイだったな。 \n 魔界では 一刻を争う事態になってるんだ。\n:
You're... Shini, right? The Demon World's
kinda pressed for time. We can't afford any
delays.

265715.「先ほど ツスクルの村から 使者が来て\n ある重要な伝言を あずかったのです。:
A messenger from the village of Tsusukul just
arrived with an important message.

265716.「エルフの神 エルドナの神託により 明日\n 大いなる風が吹く時 世界樹の丘にて:
By the word of the Elven goddess Eldona, tomorrow, when the great wind blows, Lady Himea will fulfill her final mission on
Yggdrahill.

265717.「ツスクルの村では ゆかりの深い方々を集め\n 夜を通して 宴を催すそうです。\:
In Tsusukul Village, they hold a nightlong
feast for those who have close ties to the
village. To bid farewell to this life...

265719.「明日 巫女ヒメアは……\n 世界樹の守り人としての 役目を果たしたのち\n そ:
Tomorrow... when Maiden Himea fulfills her
role as guardian of Yggdrasil, her life will
come to an end.

265720.「世界は 滅びに瀕している。\n 魔界に迫る危機も 承知しているつもりです。\n:
The world is on the verge of extinction. I am
well aware of the danger that looms over the
Demon World. And yet, I...

265721.「ツスクルの村の皆さんに 大切な人との\n 別れを惜しむ時間を 過ごしてほしいの:
I want everyone in Tsusukul Village to take a
moment to say goodbye to their loved one.
Please, stay here tonight.

265722.「ねえねえ！ 村長さんのお客さんを\n 村のみんなで 歓迎しようよ！:
Hey, hey! Let's welcome the chief's guest with
a village welcome!

265723.「そりゃ いい考えだ！\n 村中に声をかけて 準備を始めるとしようぜ。:
That's a great idea! Let's gather the
villagers and get things set up.

265724.「オラたちが仕込んだ 名物エテーネルスープ\n たっぷりと 味わってってくんろ！:
Please enjoy the famous Ethenel Soup that we
prepared for you!

265725.エテーネ村の人々は <pc>の客人として\nユシュカを歓迎し 盛大に もてなした:
The people of Ethene Village welcomed Yushka
as <pc>'s guest and treated him
with great hospitality.

265726.あたたかな食事を みんなで囲み\n話に花を咲かせるうちに やがて 夜も更けて\n:
After everyone sat down to a warm meal and
chatted together, the villagers soon returned
to their homes...

265727.「しかし <pc>…… \n 村の長をやってたとは 知らなかったぞ。\n 大魔王:
But <pc>... I didn't know you were
the village chief. So you were already a king
before you became Great Demon King.

265728.「あなたは 協調を うたっておきながら \n 人の話を 聞かなすぎではありません:
You talk about cooperation, but you don't
listen to others, do you? You made our chief
your servant without a second thought!

265729.「はははははっ！ \n そう蒸し返すなって。悪かったよ。\n 昔 副官殿にも 同:
Hahahahaha! No need to dredge up the past like
that. I'm sorry, okay? My right-hand man used
to tease me the same way.

265730.「協調……協調か。そうだな……\n 俺は また 間違えているのかもしれない。:
Cooperation... cooperation. Well... I could be
wrong again, for all I know.

265731.「俺が関わっていく全員と 協調できれば\n もっと たくさんの大事なものを\n:
I thought if I could work with everyone I
interacted with, I could protect a lot more
important things.

265732.「でも 実際 俺は助けられてばかりで \n 誰かを 犠牲にし続けている。\n こ:
But in reality, I'm the one who keeps getting
saved, while others are sacrificed. And after
tonight, even Maiden Himea will be...

265733.「なあ……俺が やってることは\n 本当に正しいのか……？: Hey... am I really doing the right thing...?

265735.「魔族とは 目的のために手段を選ばない\n 残酷な種族…… そう思っていました。:
Demons are supposed to be cruel creatures that
would do anything to achieve their goals... or
so I thought.

265736.「ですが……あなたが抱いた 悔しさを \n 私も 今 同じように 感じている……:
But... the frustration you're feeling is the
same I'm feeling right now... that much is
true.

265737.「ユシュカさんを 見ていると\n 魔族が わからなくなってきますよ。:
Looking at you, Yushka, I feel like I don't
truly understand demons.

265738.「さてと。もう遅いですし…… \n 先に戻って 寝床をととのえてきましょう。\n:
Anyway, it's getting late... I'll go ahead and
prepare your beds. My special pillow has a
knack for helping people sleep well!

265739.「よく働く 幼なじみ殿だ。: Your friend there is a real hard worker.

265740.「たくさんの村人と話したが クチをそろえて\n この村で暮らせることを 感謝して:
I talked to a lot of the villagers, and they were all thankful to be living in this village. They said it's a warm village made
possible by the village chief.

265741.「分けへだてなく 誰をも受け入れる国は\n 俺の理想郷でもある。\n ……いい村:
A country that accepts everyone without
distinction is my idea of utopia... this is a
nice village.

265742.「なあ。この村を作るまでに\n お前は どんな旅をしてきたんだ？:
Hey. What kind of journey did you go through
that led you to building this village?

265743.「夜が明けるまで まだ時間があるだろ。\n 眠る前に 聞かせてくれないか……\n:
We still have some time before sunrise. Before
you go to sleep, I want to hear the story of
our Great Demon King.<yesno><close>

265744.「そう言わずに頼む。付き合いも長くなったのに\n お前のこと まだまだ 知らない:
Don't be like that. We've known each other for a while now, but I still don't know that much about you. Let's take this opportunity for me
to hear your story.

265745.<pc>は ユシュカに\nこれまでの冒険を 語って聞かせた。:
<pc> recounted their adventures so
far to Yushka.

265746.それは 長く 果てしない物語だった。\n<pc>の話を ユシュカは\nずっと 静:
It was a long story that seemed to last
forever. Yushka listened intently to
<pc>'s story the entire time...

265747.すべてを語り終えた <pc>は\nまだ たき火にあたりたいという\nユシュカを残:
When <pc> was finished, they
returned to their house, while Yushka remained
by the bonfire.

265748.「盾島で 死にぞこないを拾った あの日から \n そこいらの奴とは違うと 思って:
I knew from the day I picked up that half-dead guy on Shield Island that they were different, but... they're more amazing than I could have
imagined.

265749.「<pc>と……\n もっと早く こうして話せばよかった。:
<pc> and I... should've had this
talk a long time ago.

265750.「お前とだって たくさん話して ケンカして\n ようやく わかりあえたんだったな:
Even you and I talked and fought a lot, but
eventually, we finally understood each other,
didn't we?

265753.「よく来てくれましたね <pc>。\n 魔界からの客人も さあ こちらへ……。:
You've come a long way, <pc>. And
our guest from the Demon World. Come, this
way...

265754.「あなたがたが ここを訪れた理由は\n わかっています。: I know why you are here.

265755.「母なる女神の命を奪った 滅びの神こそ\n 破滅の衝動に囚われた 大いなる悪しき:
The God of Destruction, who took the life of
the Mother Goddess, is a vile darkness that
exists only to destroy the living.

265756.「捨て置けば 悪しき闇は 地の底より魔瘴を放ち \n 魔界とアストルティアを ひ:
If left unchecked, this darkness will release demon miasma from the depths of the earth, consuming the Demon World and Astoltia
alike... We must now unite as one.

265757.「世界樹の花は 花開きの聖祭にて\n 我が命を神気となして 咲きほこり\n 今は:
The Yggdrasil Flower, which granted me
divinity at the Blooming Festival, is now in
full bloom, here, within me...

265758.「だが それを取り出したら あんたは……。: But if we remove it, then you'll...

265759.「とうに 覚悟はできています。\n そのうえ ゆうべは思いがけず いとしい子らと:
I am already prepared for it. Last night, I
was able to say goodbye to some of my dear
children.

265760.「支度は すべて ととのっています。\n 今こそ 我が天命を果たす時。:
Everything is in place. Now is the time to
fulfill my destiny.

265762.「俺は アストルティアの民と交渉し\n 長い歴史の中で つちかわれた\n 魔瘴へ:
I have been negotiating with the people of Astoltia, trying to receive a countermeasure to the demon miasma that they have developed
over their long history.

265763.「世界樹は……そして あんたが守ってきた\n 世界樹の花は 間違いなく そのひと:
Yggdrasil... and the Yggdrasil Flower you've been protecting is definitely one of those countermeasures. The hope of stopping the Age
of Miasma and saving the Demon World...

265764.「以前の俺なら よろこんで\n 魔界へ 持ちかえっていただろうな。\n だが……:
The old me would've been more than happy to
take it off your hands and back to the Demon
World. But now...

265765.「このやり方は 間違ってるんじゃないか？\n あんたが 犠牲にならなくたって\n:
I think this is the wrong way to go about it.
There must be another way without sacrificing
yourself.

265766.「俺は また 何もしてやれない。\n それが たまらなく……イヤなんだ。:
Once again, I find myself unable to decide on
anything. I can't stand it...

265767.「私たちは 世界という大樹に 芽吹く若葉。\n 時に 擦れ合い 時に 重なり合い:
We are the budding young leaves of the great tree called the world. We may quarrel, we may overlap, and we may live in harmony to protect
this tree.

265768.「一葉一葉が 異なる枝の先に \n 異なる役割を担って 生まれ\n 天命を終えれ:
Each leaf grows with a different purpose on
different branches, and when it finishes its
life, they dissipate into the wind.

265769.「これが 世界の理。\n あなたが見送った 多くの人々と同じように\n あなたも:
This is the way of the world. Like so many
others you've seen off, the time will come
when you and I must play our parts.

265770.「私は ５００年 風に揺られ 散りゆく葉。 \n 今 とても 満たされていますよ:
I have been a leaf adrift in the wind for 500
years. In this moment, I feel fulfilled...

265771.「そなたたちに 世界樹の花を託す前に\n ひとつ 頼みがあります。:
Before I entrust the Yggdrasil Flower to you,
I have one request.

265772.「私が 命を終えてのち 何もせねば\n 遠からず 新たな世界樹の守り人が選ばれて:
If I do nothing after my death, a new guardian
of Yggdrasil will be chosen in the near future
and given immortality.

265773.「ですが もし 魔瘴の根源が消滅すれば\n 世界樹の守り人は その役割を終え\n:
But if the source of the demon miasma
disappears, Yggdrasil will no longer require a
guardian, and I shall be its last.

265774.「どうか 必ず……\n 異界滅神ジャゴヌバを 倒してください。\n それが 巫女:
Please, you must... defeat the Eldritch God
Jagonuba. That is Maiden Himea's final
request.

265776.「……承知した。必ず ジャゴヌバを倒し\n この世界を救ってみせる。:
...Understood. We WILL defeat Jagonuba and
save this world.

265777.「これより 光の郷フィネトカへ向かい \n 聖光教主様のもとを 訪ねなさい。\n:
From here, go to Light Town Finetka and speak
to the Light Lord. He will teach you how to
use the Flower.

265778.「そなたらの未来に 世界樹と\n 風の守りが あらんことを。:
May Yggdrasil and the wind watch over and
protect you.

265779.「<pc>……。\n これまで そなたには 世話になりました。\n 心から 感謝:
<pc>... I want to thank you for
all you have done for me. I thank you from the
bottom of my heart.

265780.「数奇な運命をたどってきた そなたこそ\n 皆の先頭に立つのに ふさわしい。:
You have had a strange fate, and you deserve
to lead us all.

265781.「どうか このアストルティアを\n かがやける未来へと 導いてください。\n さ:
Please lead Astoltia into a brighter future.
Now... go!

265782.「<pc>……。\n 生き返しを受けたそなたが 若葉の試みを終え\n ツスクルを:
<pc>... I remember well the day
when you, who had been brought back to life,
left Tsusukul after the Trial of New Leaves.

265783.「そなたの身体の持ち主は エルフの宝でした。\n しかし 今のそなたは 紛れもな:
The owner of your body was a treasure of the
Elves. But now, you are without a doubt the
treasure of all Astoltia.

265784.「どうか これからも 皆の先頭に立ち\n かがやける未来へと 導いてください。\:
Please continue to guide everyone towards a
brighter future. Now... go!

265786.「そなたの魂に抱かれて ようやく\n この 永き生が終わるのだと わかる。:
Being embraced by your spirit like this, I now
know that my long life is at an end.

265787.「一度目は 黄泉へ送った そなたを追って。\n 二度目は いとおしい思い出を胸に:
The first time was when I saw you off to the afterlife. The second, when I was prepared to complete my mission and depart with fond
memories in my heart.

265788.「だというのに 三度目の今は……\n この世に 未練が残る。:
And yet now, in this third time... I am left
with a lingering regret for this world.

265789.「役割とはいえ あの子らを 苛烈な戦いに \n 送り出し 必勝の誓いさえ 立てさ:
I sent them into a grueling battle, even
though it was their duty, and even made them
swear an oath to win. Was I too selfish?

265790.「本当は……去りがたいのだ……。\n この思い そなただけは わかってほしい。:
The truth is... it's hard for me to leave...
and I want you to understand this feeling.

265791.<center>ヒメア。いとしい ヒメア。\nわかっているよ……。: Himea. My dear Himea. I understand...

265792.<center>僕は そんな君を 心から誇りに思う。\n君は 充分に よくやった: I am truly proud of you. You have done well.

265793.<center>だけど 我が妻 ヒメア。\n今日こそ 君を連れていく。:
But my wife, Himea. Today is the day I must
take you with me.

265794.<center>風となって 世界の未来を……\n若葉たちの息吹を 見守ろう。:
Become the wind, and watch over the world's
future... let us watch our young leaves
sprout.

265795.<center>さあ。ともに 天のかなたへ。: Come with me, to the far reaches of the sky.

265797.<center>我が夫 コハク。ともに逝こう。: My husband, Kohaku. Let us go together.

265798.<center>いつも そばで 見守っていますよ。\n私の いとしい子供たち……:
I will always be there watching over you. My
dear children...

265800.「何も聞こえない。息が詰まりそうだ……。\n ここは 本当に 光の河の中なのか？:
I don't hear anything. It's hard to breathe...
Is this really the River of Light?

265801.「きっと あの光が 女神の魂だ！: That light must be the soul of the Goddess!

265804.「私は 虚無の邪神ヴァニタトス。\n 忘却と失意を つかさどる者。:
I am Vanitatos, Evil God of Nihility. He who
rules over oblivion and despair.

265805.「こんなところに 邪神が……！？: An Evil God in a place like this...!?

265806.「ジャゴヌバ様に 命じられて \n ずっと 女神の魂を 探していたのだけど\n:
I have been searching for the soul of the
Goddess as Lord Jagonuba commanded, but this
is too much of a coincidence.

265807.「あなたがたは 運がいい。 \n 私の両手が あなたがたの魂を包んだ時\n 世界:
You are most fortunate. With your souls in my
clutches, you will be lost to the world's
memory and become as nothing.

265808.「誰からも 忘れられれば 使命や重責……\n この世のしがらみから 自由になれる:
When you are forgotten by all... you shall finally be free of duty, of burden, of all that ties you to this world. Give thanks to
Lord Jagonuba for this mercy.

265809.「余計なお世話を ありがとうよ。\n 準備はいいか <cs_pchero>！:
Thanks, but no thanks. Ready to go,
<pc>?

265810.「虚しい。虚しい。なんて 虚しいの！\n あなたがたは 神話の時代から\n 何ひ:
Vain. Vain. So vain! Even since the age of the
gods, your kind has not changed one bit...

265811.「苦しみ もがいて 戦い抜いて\n あなたがたの仲間は 次々に 倒れていく。\n:
Your companions, suffering, struggling,
fighting, fall one by one. All without knowing
the despair that awaits them at the end.

265812.「ああ……愛する者のいない 虚しい世界を \n 救う意味が どこにあるというの？:
Ahh... what is the point of saving an empty
world, if there is no one left in it to love?

265813.「黙れ！\n 邪神ごときが 人の意味を語るな。:
Shut up! I don't need an Evil God preaching to
me about a person's worth.

265815.「おいで。抱きしめてあげる。 \n 無意味な生にむらがる 無価値な命ども。:
Come. Enter my embrace. You worthless
creatures clinging to meaningless lives.

265817.「いつの世も あなたがたは 同じ。\n まるで 苦しむことを 楽しんでいるよう…:
No matter the era, you are still the same. It
is as if you enjoy suffering...

265818.「好きに 生き抜いてごらんなさい。\n その先に待っているのは 虚無ばかり。:
Live out your life as you wish, then. In the
end, all that awaits you is emptiness.

265819.「なぜなら あなたがたは……\n 最後に 必ず 負けるのだから。: Because in the end... you will always lose.

265820.「魔界に渦巻く 邪悪な怨念が\n 我が主より ほとばしる魔瘴と結びつき\n 地の:
The evil grudges swirling in the Demon World,
as well as the miasma called forth by my lord,
rises from the depths of the earth...

265821.「時は来た……終焉の始まりだ！: It is time... for the beginning of the end!

265823.「いつか わかる時が来る。\n あなたがたの おこないに 意味などなく\n 未来:
One day, you will understand. That what you do
has no meaning, and that the future is nothing
but emptiness...

265825.「そいつが 女神の魂に違いない。\n 世界樹の花を！:
That's got to be the spirit of the Goddess.
Now, the Yggdrasil Flower!

265826.「花から 蝶が生まれた……？: A butterfly was born from the flower...?

265828.<center>我は 女神ルティアナ。\n光の胡蝶の姿を借りて この世に舞い戻っ:
I am the Goddess Lutiana. I have returned to
this world in the form of this Butterfly of
Light.

265829.「世界樹の花のチカラで よみがえったのか。\n やったな <cs_pchero>:
The Yggdrasil Flower brought Her back to
life. You did it, <cs_pchero>!

265831.<center>世界樹の花に宿る 神気が\n我が魂を つなぎとめているに過ぎぬ。:
The spirit that resides in the Yggdrasil
Flower is the only thing that keeps my soul in
place. I cannot live without it.

265832.<center>我が身は 小さき胡蝶なれど\n魔瘴を退けるチカラは 宿っているよ:
I may be a small butterfly, but I still
possess the power to repel demon miasma.

265833.<center>我も そなたらと共に 魔界へ行こう。\n大魔瘴期に混迷する者たち:
I, too, shall go with you to the Demon World.
To save those who are suffering in the Age of
Miasma.

265834.<center>アストルティアと魔界をつないだ そなたならば\nこの大いなる聖戦:
If you are the link between Astoltia and the Demon World, then you will surely prevail in this great crusade. The fate of the world is
in your hands...

265836.「とうとう 大魔瘴期が来た……。: At last, the Age of Miasma has arrived...

265837.「留守の間 魔界各地の状況を調べるよう \n カーロウに 頼んである。\n すぐ:
I've asked Carlow to check on the situation
around the Demon World while we were gone. See
you at your castle soon!

265839.「だ だ だ……大魔王さま～っ！: G, G, G... Great Demon King～!

265840.「ええ ええ！ もちろん！\n 必ず 無事に帰ってきてくださると\n このカーロ:
Yes, yes! Of course! I, Carlow, always
believed that you would return safely!

265841.「ユシュカどのに 頼まれていた通り\n 魔界各地の情報を 城の兵士たちに探らせ\:
As Lord Yushka requested, I had the soldiers gather information on the different regions of the Demon World, and I have just received
their reports...

265842.「はっ！ ご報告申し上げます 大魔王様。\n 突如として 魔界全土が 濃厚な魔瘴:
Yes! This is what we've found, Great Demon King. Suddenly, in every corner, the entire Demon World has been enveloped in a thick fog
of demon miasma!

265843.「ついに 魔界南端のファラザードまで\n 魔瘴に 包まれてしまいました！\n 今:
And now even Farazard, in the southern reaches
of the Demon World, has been enveloped! The
people there are holding on as best they can!

265844.「この魔瘴 これまでとは 何かが違います。 \n 少し触れただけで 意識が遠のき:
This demon miasma is different from anything I've ever experienced. Just a slight touch makes me feel like I'm losing consciousness,
like I'm not myself anymore.

265845.「弱い魔物や魔族が 濃厚な魔瘴を浴びて\n 苦しみもがきながら 命を落としたとい:
There were horrifying reports of weak monsters
and demons suffering and struggling to death
from the thick demon miasma...

265846.「大魔王さまっ！ 大魔瘴期が始まれば\n 魔界の民は 皆 死に絶えるというのは\:
Great Demon King! Is it true that once the Age
of Miasma begins, all the people of the Demon
World will die out!?

265847.「魔界の未来に 希望は あるのでしょうか？\n 大魔王さまぁ～～っ！！:
Is there any hope for the Demon World's
future? Great Demon King～～!!

265848.「おおおっ この輝きは……！？: Ohhh, what is that radiant shine...!?

265849.「我らが大魔王は アストルティアより\n 新たなチカラを得て ここに帰還した。:
Our Great Demon King has returned from
Astoltia with a new power.

265850.「今やるべきは おびえることではない。 \n 大魔王のもとに 魔界が一丸となって:
What we need to do now is not panic. We must
unite under the banner of the Great Demon King
if we are to overcome this crisis.

265851.「おぉ……そうですとも！\n ワタクシには よ～く わかっておりますぞ。:
Oh... yes, of course! I know exactly what you
mean.

265852.「大魔王さまのご威光は 絶望をも打ち砕き\n 必ずや 魔界を救ってくださるのです:
The Great Demon King's glory will crush
despair and save the Demon World! Isn't that
right, Great Demon King?<yesno><close>

265853.「……最近 耳が遠くて いけませんなあ。\n 大魔王さまは 必ず 魔界を救ってく:
I'm afraid I'm hard of hearing these days.
Great Demon King will surely save the Demon
World. Isn't that right, Great Demon King?<yesno><close>

265854.「おおっ…… 大魔王様 ばんざい！: Oh... Long live the Great Demon King!

265855.「よかった……。安心したら\n なんだか 元気が わいてきました。\n 魔瘴なん:
Thank goodness... I feel more energized now
that I'm relieved. I won't let that demon
miasma get me down!

265856.「我ら 心をひとつにして\n 大魔王さまを お助けいたします！:
We will unite our hearts to help the Great
Demon King!

265857.「そうだ。まずは 落ち着いてくれ。\n どんな ささいな変化でもいい。\n 他に:
Right. Let's calm down for a second. Is there
any other new information? It doesn't matter
how small it is.

265858.「そういえば……ここしばらく 鎮まっていた\n ジャリムバハ砂漠の魔瘴塚が\n:
Actually... I head the Miasmound in Jyarimbaha
Desert, which had been quelled for a while, is
now active again.

265859.「あの 魔瘴塚が！？\n カーロウ。それは 本当か！: That miasmound!? Carlow, are you sure!?

265860.「い…以前よりも 濃厚な魔瘴が 吹き出し\n 近づけば 即死間違いなしとかナント:
The demon miasma is even thicker than before,
and if you get close to it, you're sure to die
instantly, or worse...

265861.「あのう…… ユシュカどの？\n そんなに 大きな声を出されて\n どうかなさい:
Um... Lord Yushka? Why are you raising your
voice like that...?

265863.「俺は ジャリムバハ砂漠の 魔瘴塚へ向かう。 \n すまないが お前も なるべく:
I'm heading to the miasmound in the Jyarimbaha
Desert. I'm sorry, but I need you to bring
the butterfly with you... I'm counting on you!

265864.「何やら ただならぬ様子でしたが……\n ユシュカどのが向かった 魔瘴塚は\n:
Something seems off, but... the miasmound that
Lord Yushka is headed to is in the northwest
part of Jyarimbaha Desert.

265865.「ワタクシどもは 大魔王さまを信じて\n 大魔瘴期から この城を 守り抜きますぞ:
We believe in the Great Demon King, and will
protect this castle from the Age of Miasma.
Take care, and have a safe trip!

265871.「ぐっ……すさまじい瘴気だ。\n ここで この魔瘴で……みんな……。:
This is a terrible miasma. Here, with this
demon miasma... everyone...

265872.<center>かの魔瘴塚が 魔瘴の嵐の元凶。\n我が光で 浄化を施そう。:
The miasmound is the source of this storm of
miasma. Let my light purify it.

265873.「魔瘴塚を 一瞬で浄化した……！？\n 女神のチカラは すごいな。:
The miasmound was instantly purified...?!
The Goddess' power is incredible...

265874.「来てくれて 助かった。\n ここは 俺にとって どうしても\n 見過ごせない場:
Thank you for coming. This is one place I just
can't pass up...

265875.「３００年くらい前 俺が 子供の頃の話だ。\n 親父は宝石商で 十数人から成る隊:
It was about 300 years ago, when I was a kid. My father was a jeweler, and he was leading a team of about a dozen or so merchants, moving
through the desert, trading with them.

265876.「仲間たちは 血のつながりはなくても\n みんな 家族も同然だった。\n にぎや:
Even though our companions were not related by
blood, they were all like family. It was fun
to live in the bustling life of a merchant.

265877.「俺は 魔界一の宝石商になるために\n 親父のそばで 商売のコツや交渉術を\n:
I was going to learn the art of negotiation at
my father's side in order to become the best
jeweler in the Demon World.

265878.「だが 親父は 将来のための教育だと言って\n 幼い俺を 当時のネクロデアに あ:
But my father, saying he was educating me for the future, left me in the hands of the then Necrodea and went off to lead a troop of
merchants.

265879.「仲間はずれにされたと思って\n 子供心に ずいぶん キズついたし\n ナジーン:
I remember feeling left out, and I was so hurt
as a child, and I remember hitting Nadine...

265880.「だが ネクロデアでは 隊商暮らしのままでは \n わからない たくさんのことを:
But I learned a lot of things in Necrodea that I wouldn't have learned if I'd stayed in the garrison. Now I'm thankful for my father's
educational policy.

265881.「……ある日 ネクロデアに 一報が入った。\n 親父が率いる隊商が 砂漠の北西で:
One day, Necrodea received a message. The
trader led by my father had suddenly
disappeared in the northwest of the desert.

265882.「駆けつけてみると 悲惨な光景が広がっていた。 \n 親父たちが 交易で差しかか:
When I rushed there, I found a horrible scene. It seems that a miasmound had suddenly appeared where my father and his family were
approaching on a trading trip.

265883.「ひと晩で 家族みんなを失ったんだ……。 \n 魔界ではよくあることと 言ってし:
I lost my whole family in one night... which,
let's just say, is a common thing in Demon
World, but I... couldn't accept it at all.

265884.「それで 魔瘴塚が出現した 理由を求めて\n 各地を旅するようになったのさ。:
So I started traveling around the country
trying to find out why the miasmounds
appeared.

265885.「はじめて 師匠に会ったのは その時だ。\n そして 魔瘴塚が現れた原因は この:
It was at that time that I first met my master. I was told that the miasma mounds were a sign that the Age of Miasma was soon
approaching.

265886.「もし 大魔瘴期が来れば 魔界すべてが\n 親父たちのように 無残に死に絶える。:
If the Age of Miasma comes, the entire Demon
World will die out as cruelly as our fathers
did. That must never happen.

265887.「俺は 宝石商として 旅をしながら\n 親父たちの悲劇と 大魔瘴期の脅威を\n:
I traveled around as a jeweler, spreading the
tragedy of my fathers and the threat of the
Age of Miasma throughout Demon World.

265888.「そうすれば やがて 魔界がひとつになって\n 大魔瘴期を回避するために 立ち上:
I believed that if we did that, eventually the
Demon World would unite and rise up to take
action to avert the Age of Miasma.

265891.「帰れ帰れ！ お前のような 生意気なガキを\n 我らの魔王が 相手にするものか。:
Go home, go home! Our Demon King has no use
for a cocky little brat like you. Demon miasma
is nothing!

265892.「あれは ただの魔瘴とは違う！\n どうして 俺の話を 聞いてくれないんだよ！？:
That was no ordinary demon miasma! Why won't
you listen to me?

265893.「お前らの戦争だって 魔瘴が増えたせいで\n 領地を奪い合うから 起きたんだ。\:
Even your wars were caused by the increase in demon miasma, which led to you fighting over territory. If that's the case, you need to do
something about demon miasma first!

265894.「適当に理由つけて 考えるのをやめるな。\n ちゃんと想像しろよ！ 魔界の未来を:
Don't stop to think for the right reasons.
Imagine properly! The future of Demon World!

265896.「……どこへ行っても 誰と話しても \n 最後まで 理解されることはなかった。:
...No matter where I went or who I talked to,
they never understood me to the end.

265897.「俺は 何も変えることが できなかった。\n 思考の止まった よどんだ魔界の前で:
I couldn't change anything. In front of the
stagnant Demon World, where thinking has
stopped, any truth is meaningless.

265898.「本当に 魔界を変えたいと願うなら\n ただの宝石商では ダメだ……。\n 民の:
If you really want to change Demon World, you can't be a mere jeweler... you have to become a Demon King who moves the hearts of his
people.

265899.「いいや。その魔王すらも 統べる王……\n 大魔王にならなければ 魔界に未来など:
No. If I don't become the King who rules even that Demon King... the Great Demon King, there's no future in Demon World. I came here
with that much determination.

265900.「だから お前が 大魔王の資格者だと言われた時\n 認められなかった。魔界を知ら:
That's why... when I heard you were qualified to be Great Demon King, I just couldn't accept it. How could someone who knows nothing
of the Demon World be prepared for what's to come?

265901.「あの時は 悪かった。\n すまなかったな……<pc>。:
I'm sorry about that time. Sorry about
that...<pc>.

265902.「エテーネ村では お前の話が聞けて よかった。\n 世界の命運を背負ってきた お:
It was good to hear your story in Ethene Village. It is precisely because you have carried the fate of the world on your
shoulders that you were destined to become the Great Demon King.

265903.「俺は お前が 魔界の未来のために\n 必死に戦ってくれることが うれしいんだ。:
I'm glad that you are fighting so hard for the
future of Demon World.

265904.「これまで やってきたことは……\n 無駄じゃなかったんだなと 思えてさ。:
I feel like everything I've done so far...
hasn't been in vain.

265905.「必ず 魔界を救おう。\n 俺たちの手で ジャゴヌバを倒し\n ふたつの世界に:
We will save the Demon World. With our own
hands, we will defeat Jagonuba and restore
peace to our two worlds.

265906.「……なんだか 変な話を聞かせちまったな！\n 過去を振り返るなんて ガラじゃな:
...I'm sorry, I've got some weird stories to
tell you! It wasn't a rattle to look back on
the past, was it?

265907.「おお 大魔王様……！ 捜しましたぞ！:
Oh, Great Demon King...! I've been looking for
you!

265908.「私は バルディスタの使者です。\n ヴァレリア様から 急ぎの伝言があり\n こ:
I am Valdista's emissary. I am here with an
urgent message from Valeria.

265910.「今後 ザハディガル岩峰への移動を \n 一切禁ずる。現地のアビスゲートも\n:
From now on, all travel to Zahadigal Rock Peak
is strictly prohibited. The local Abyss Gate
has also been closed, so please be careful...

265911.「大魔瘴期の影響か かの地の魔瘴塚が \n 急激に活性化し 一気に魔瘴を放出した:
Perhaps due to the Age of Miasma, the mounds in that area suddenly activated, releasing their miasma all at once.
It was a difficult decision to prevent further damage.

265912.「あそこには 遠征軍駐屯所があったはずだ。\n 奴らを 見殺しにするつもりか……:
There must have been an Expedition Station
there. You're just going to let them die...!
There must be some lives we can save.

265913.「バルディスタ城に行って ヴァレリアに会おう。\n 話を聞いてくれるかは わから:
Let's go to Valdista Castle and meet Valeria.
I don't know if she'll listen to me, but let's
just try, Great Demon King!

265915.「大魔王どのか。アストルティアから\n 戻ったと聞いて こちらから伝令を出したが:
Great Demon King, is it? When I heard that you
had returned from Astoltia, I sent a message
from here, but did we cross paths somewhere?

265916.「いや……その件で 来たんだ。\n 今すぐ ザハディガル岩峰の封鎖を\n 解いて:
No... that's why I'm here. I need you to break
the blockade on Zahadigal Rock Peak right now.

265917.「遠征軍駐屯所の兵が 取り残されているはずだ。 \n みすみす 犠牲を出すような:
The soldiers of the Expedition Station must have been left behind. Our Great Demon King is against any measures that would cause such a
casualty.

265918.「俺たちだって 救えるもんなら\n とっくに 救ってるさ……。:
If we could save them, we would have saved
them.

265919.「魔瘴塚を破壊するために 魔瘴対策部隊を\n 向かわせたんだが すぐに連絡が途絶:
We sent a demon miasma task force out to
destroy the miasmounds, but soon lost contact
with them.

265920.「わかんだろ……。それほどまでに \n 魔瘴の勢いは 増してるってこった。\n:
You see... that's how much the demon miasma is
increasing. The best we can do is to block it.

265921.「……率直に言って 打つ手がないのだ。\n イルーシャがいなくなった 今では\n:
Frankly speaking, there is nothing we can do.
Now that Irusha is gone, we can't even purify
the miasmounds.

265922.「いや……まだ 手はある。: No... we still have a hand.

265923.「なんだ こりゃあ……！\n まぶしくて 見てられんッ。:
What the hell is this? It's too dazzling to
look at.

265925.「女神ルティアナの化身だ。\n すでに 砂漠の魔瘴塚を 浄化してくれた。:
She is an incarnation of the Goddess Lutiana.
She's already purified the miasmound in the
desert.

265926.「フッ……なるほど。短い期間で\n 戦果は きっちり 上げてきたというわけか。:
I see. I see...so you've achieved a lot in a
short period of time, huh?

265927.「俺たちが 魔瘴塚を浄化しに行く。\n 駐屯所に取り残された連中を 助けるぞ！:
We're going to clean up the miasmound. We'll
help those left behind in the garrison!

265928.「ベルトロ。ザハディガル岩峰の 封鎖を解け。: Beltro. Unblock the Zahadigal Rock Peak.

265930.「駐屯所には 飲み仲間もいるんだ……\n マジで 期待しちまうぜ？ 大魔王サマ。:
I've got a drinking companion in the
garrison... seriously, what can I
expect? Great Demon King.
